## EpochInfo interface

Information about the current epoch.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface EpochInfo 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [absoluteSlot](./web3.js.epochinfo.absoluteslot.md) | number | The current slot. |
|  [blockHeight?](./web3.js.epochinfo.blockheight.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> The current block height. |
|  [epoch](./web3.js.epochinfo.epoch.md) | number | The current epoch. |
|  [slotIndex](./web3.js.epochinfo.slotindex.md) | number | The current slot relative to the start of the current epoch. |
|  [slotsInEpoch](./web3.js.epochinfo.slotsinepoch.md) | number | The number of slots in this epoch. |
|  [transactionCount?](./web3.js.epochinfo.transactioncount.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> The current number of transactions in the current epoch. |
